Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: Pip~neuma m~parakl/ton: v/e~tafi~ e~jen nia~poctoloc: qen p~sai n~}pent/koct/: aucaji qen hanm/s n~lac.
The Spirit of Comfort, came down upon the Apostles, on the feast of Pentecost, and they spoke in many tongues.

Afsenaf e~p~swi e~t~ve: n~te t~ve caniman~sai: hina n~tefouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton: pip~neuma n~te ]meym/.
He ascended into the heaven, of heavens towards the east, to send to us the Paraclete, the Spirit of truth.

All/louia (4) Pi,~rictoc aftwnf ouoh afsenaf: afouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton.
Alleluia. (4) Christ is risen and has ascended; He sent to us the Paraclete.
